org.gbif.api.service.checklistbank

Interface NameUsageComponentService<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DescriptionService, DistributionService, ImageService, ReferenceService, SpeciesProfileService, TypeSpecimenService, VernacularNameService

    public interface NameUsageComponentService<T>
    Parameterized service interface for NameUsage's components Interface methods. T being the interpreted model class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(int key)
      Returns a component.
      PagingResponse<T> listByUsage(int usageKey, Pageable page)
      Returns all components for a checklist usage.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nullable
T get(int key)
        Returns a component. The object returned is the interpreted version of it.
        Returns:
        A component or null if none can be found

      • listByUsage

        PagingResponse<T> listByUsage(int usageKey,
                            @Nullable
                            Pageable page)
        Returns all components for a checklist usage. The objects returned are the interpreted versions.
        Parameters:
        usageKey - the usage the components are related to
        page - paging parameters or null for first page with default size
        Returns:
        Wrapper that contains a potentially empty component list, but never null
